action.action-desc: Ms. Perez (for herself and Mr. Golden of Maine) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Rules

form.official-title: Eliminating the restriction that witnesses may appear remotely at proceedings of committees of the House of Representatives only at the discretion of the chair of the committee.

section.text: This resolution may be cited as the Bringing Real Ideas, Data, and Genuine Experience to Congress Resolution or the BRIDGE to Congress Resolution.

section.header: Elimination of restriction that witnesses may appear remotely at committee proceedings only at discretion of chair
section.text: Section 3(i)(1) of House Resolution 5, agreed to January 3, 2025, is amended by striking at the discretion of the chair of the committee and.
